name: Namkeen Gosht Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Namkeen Gosht Recipe: Mutton 1 kilo (big pieces) Salt 2 tsp (leve) crushed Black pepper 2 tsp Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp Onion (coarsely sliced) 2 Cooking oil ½ cup
instructions: In a large pan spread half meat sprinkled with ½ quantity of ginger garlic paste, salt, black pepper and ½ onion . Again layer with remaining meat add ginger garlic, salt, black pepper and onion. Seal pan with flour dough and cook on slow flame for one hour . Open pan discard onions and serve sprinkle with all spice powder.
